name: Alone With You
description: Alone With You is a bittersweet sci-fi adventure game that goes right for the heart. Escape a doomed space colony with the help of your troubled AI companion and four chatty holograms in this unique blend of adventure & visual novel storytelling.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 (32- or 64-bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo (2GHz+) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT /  Radeon HD 3870 (512MB) /  Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (32- or 64-bit) Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ VRAM Storage: 1500 MB available space
